Replaces the contents to the {{tt|path}} object by a new pathname constructed from the given character sequence.

@1@ Assigns the pathname identified by the detected-format string {{tt|source}}, which is left in valid, but unspecified state.
@2@ Assigns the pathname identified by the detected-format character range {{tt|source}}.
@3@ Assigns the pathname identified by detected-format character range {{tt|[first, last)}}.

{{cpp/filesystem/path/param source constraints|2}}

{{par begin}}
{{par | source | a character range to use, represented as {{lc|std::string}}, {{lc|std::string_view}}, pointer to a null-terminated multibyte string, or as an input iterator with char value type that points to a null-terminated multibyte string }}
{{par | first, last | a character range to use}}
{{par hreq}}
{{par req named | InputIt | InputIterator}}
{{par req | The value type of {{tt|InputIt}} must be one of the encoded character types ({{c|char}}, {{c|wchar_t}}, {{c|char16_t}} and {{c|char32_t}})}}
{{par end}}
